name: A CrabKnight's Tale
description:
Buy new equipment as you earn resources.

Upgrade your crab to defeath the 7 Ocean's Crab Champion.

Joust and defeat the local knights until you are prepared to defeat the Royal Knight in the King's Joust.

CONTROLS

SPACE to lower your pincer. You can only start the attack once per round, so time it wisely, since there is a DELAY !

Late submitted for Trijam #82 - Theme: Delay

Art & Audio by Draelent: Itch / SoundCloud

Art & Programming by miguelsgp: https://miguelsgp.itch.io/

Sea background by: Greytan

Water and hit sound effects: free open sounds from freesound.org

Submission for weekly game jam @162 "Crab"

Game was prototyped during Trijam of the same week: Trijam #82 "Delay"

This is the initial version https://miguelsgp.itch.io/joust-on-time
